articles.description: Disgraced Hey Dad! actor and convicted child sex offender Robert Hughes  will be released from jail on parole within two weeks after following a decision by the NSW State Parole Authority.
articles.content:
The child actress sexually abused by her on-screen dad believes he'll never apologise for his heinous actions as she prepares to move on with her life.
